article_title: Cruz trying to overcome Trump’s lead in SC
article_text:
Texas senator wooing evangelical voters before Feb. 20 primary

Cruz sits second in S.C. polls during a year when voters want political outsiders

Once pals with Trump, they now are fighting each other as Iowa caucuses approach

article_metadata.title: Cruz trying to overcome Trump’s lead in SC | The Herald

og.description: After seeing Ted Cruz speak in Columbia this month, David Edwards turned to his son and recalled seeing another Republican who ran for the White House.
og.title: Cruz trying to overcome Trump’s lead in SC
